question.title: How to read file and loop through content and print HTML pages
question.body:
I am using Java to try to read through a CSV file I have.

I have links in the file and I want to download each link as a separate *.html file.

What I have so far isn't much, but I was stuck about how to approach this. I was also thinking that I could use Selenium for this as well. If anyone has any tips or methods, it would be greatly appreciated. I can figure out the rest of my code on my own, but I just wanted to know if anyone had any input. Thank you.

import java.io.FileInputStream;
import java.io.InputStream;

public class CSVReader{
    public static void main(String[] args){
        try{
            InputStream input = new FileInputStream("acm_papers_january_a_474.csv");
            input.read();
            System.out.println("Data read from the file: " + input);
            input.close();

        } catch (Exception e){
            e.getStackTrace();
        }
    }
}
